commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: They weren't in the indoor bathing area, gift shop, or even the rec room. Where else could they have gone?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: They might have gone outside.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I talked to one of the employees earlier, and she said she saw two girls with bath sets going outside. What if they were Nico and Chika?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Why would they go outside? Wait, actually...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: There's an indoor public bathing area and an open-air bath, and there's a natural hot spring out in the mountains too...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: That's it. They could have been heading for the natural hot spring in the mountains! We should go look!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Here we are. This must be the natural hot spring Chika mentioned. But no one's here. In fact, it looks like no one's come here, period.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Wh-What do we do? Nozomi's reading sounded awful. You don't think they really got themselves in trouble, do you?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hanamaru, calm down.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: No one's been here, huh? Let's see, the Chariot in the reverse position means setbacks, uneasiness, losing one's path... Oh!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Maybe... Maybe they took a wrong turn and got lost.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Lost? But there was only one path here. There was even a guide map on the way here. I just don't see how they could have gotten lost.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You're right. There's only one path marked, but I recall seeing something that looked like an unmarked path. If they thought it was a short cut and went down that instead...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: EEEEEEEK!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: EW EW EW! It's a bug! A HUGE bug! A BIG, HUGE, MONSTER BUG!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: No more, please! I'm going home! I wanna go home! Help me, Mamaaa!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: *Whimper* Huh? Wh-What are you all doing here?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Waaah! Nicoooo! Wait for me! Don't leave me behiiind!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Ch-Chikaaaa!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Th-Thank goodness! I'm so glad!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Your legs are all covered in mud. You all right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? You guys! Waaah! I'm so glad. I thought I'd never see you guys again!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Where in the world did you two run off to? We tried calling and everything...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We took an unmarked trail thinking it was a shortcut to the hot spring and got lost. Th-Then it got dark, and my battery died, and there were all those bugs and...and... *Sob*

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: There, there. It must've been scary being out in the mountains after dark. It's all right, everyone's here now.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: *Sob*

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I'm just relieved you two are safe.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Okay, let's get you two cleaned up. The hot spring is right here, so let's wash all that mud and fear down the drain.

commands.speaker: Nico, Chika
commands.line: Nozomi!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Since we're all here, you all wanna take a dip too?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: That might be nice. I did sweat a little from our walk over.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I wanna freshen up with a nice hot bath, zura.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: That's a great idea. Let's all get in the bath.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru, Chika, Nico, Kanata, Shizuku
commands.line: (Hanamaru, Chika, Kanata) Yeah! (Nico) Okay! (Shizuku) Yes!
